Subskills.name: Impaling Horde
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of waves of submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Agravating Wounds
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Tidal Knives
Subskills.description: Unleash a shockwave of submerged knives towards target location.

Subskills.name: Sharp Edges
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Encased Cutters
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Jugular Cut
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: The Bigger They Are
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bosses when using submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Bone Daggers
Subskills.description: Consume corpses hit by submerged knives unleashing chaining gutting knives towards nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Extended Gutting
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range of submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Nimble Handcraft
Subskills.description: Reduces the cooldown of submerged knives.

Subskills.name: Meat Skewer
Subskills.description: Chance to impale targets on hit dealing damage over time.

Subskills.name: Sudden Chaining
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash chains towards target on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Knifehoarder
Subskills.description: Submerged knives can be activated/deactivated. While active periodically unleash submerged knives at nearby monsters inflicting bleeding. Drains a portion of your maximum mana while active.
